alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Kane; Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lake, northeastern De Kalb, northern Kane, southern McHenry and northwestern Cook Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm gust front along a line extending from Kenosha to Lakemoor to near Genoa. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Round Lake, Island Lake, Cary, Long Lake, Volo, Oakwood Hills and Port Barrington around 235 AM CDT. Zion, Wauconda, Round Lake Park, Winthrop Harbor, Lake Barrington, Fox River Grove and Tower Lakes around 240 AM CDT. Hawthorn Woods around 245 AM CDT. Mundelein, Huntley, Libertyville, Lake Zurich, Barrington, Kildeer and Forest Lake around 250 AM CDT. Including the following interstates... I-90 between mile markers 35 and 63. I-94 between mile markers 1 and 24. I-294 between mile markers 1 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Kane; Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook
